effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability gains an edge against any target not at full Stamina.

items.name: Archer's Cackletongue
items.target: Self and each ally in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Until the end of their next turn, each target gains an edge on their next strike. If any target hasn't used their own Cackletongue maneuver on this turn, they can use it immediately at no cost.
Whenever a non-minion ally within 5 squares of the abyssal archer is reduced to 0 Stamina, the abyssal archer can make a ranged free strike.
The abyssal archer doesn't need line of effect to use their abilities against any creature who isn't at full Stamina, as long as a size 1 opening exists between the archer and the target.
